title: Did ‘Antifa America’ Threaten to ‘Take What’s Ours’ from the Suburbs?
subtitle: A tweet posted amid nationwide protests and riots over the in-custody death of George Floyd caused panic. But it was a hoax.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A group calling itself "Antifa America" threatened to "take what's ours" from the suburbs in May 2020 after rioting in the nation's major cities in protest of the death of a black man in police custody.
